Chapter 2204 - Chapter 2204: How Do Summer Insects Talk To Ice? (3)

Chapter 2204: How Do Summer Insects Talk to Ice? (3)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“You…”

“It’s just a piece of advice. That’s all. It’s up to you whether you want to listen or not. ”

Bazhun’an waved his hands and interrupted Dao Qiongcang; it was obvious he did not want to say anything more.

Weng!

Dao Qiongcang was about to argue when Abyss Island shook violently. The

Holy Emperor power gathered rapidly from all directions.

“Oh!” Lei Xi’er groaned as the white flames ignited on her body again.

Although the white flames could not harm her, it still contained the power of a Holy Emperor. Even though she had the Ultimate Life Demon Physique, she still had to endure the pain that accompanied the power.

Xu Xiaoshou had experienced this kind of pain personally, so he naturally knew what it was like.

He frowned, and the red Taotie Beast Head appeared behind him. It opened its mouth and swallowed all the power that appeared on Lei Xi’er’s body.

It gulped all the power heartily!

With a ‘dong’ sound, Lei Xi’er recovered instantly, but Xu Xiaoshou moaned in agony.

In the end, he could not suppress it anymore. His seriously injured body was healed quickly by this energy.

However, he noticed Lei Xi’er’s strange gaze. He quickly cleared his throat and said.

“You don’t have to come out. There’s only one harmless Dao Qiongcang left.

You’re not needed.”

The power on Lei Xi’er was none other than the Great Infernal Ancestor’s power.

Xu Xiaoshou had some guesses as to why the Great Infernal Ancestor didn’t dare to possess him.

Perhaps it was because it sensed danger- a similar danger to Feng Yujin’s Sealing Power with its spiritual intelligence that could invade his body, but was cut off by the Passive System.

Thus, during the Four Divine Pillars, the Great Infernal Ancestor chose Lei Xi’er.

It didn’t matter. It didn’t affect the final outcome.

Now that everything was over, Bazhun’an wanted to get rid of Dao Qiongcang.

Xu Xiaoshou, who had a brief moment of glory, knew that he didn’t need to make such a big fuss to deal with a mere demi-saint, so he spoke up.

Great Infernal Ancestor’s power vanished without a trace, and it did not actually come out.

“Was I awesome?” Xu Xiaoshou raised his eyebrows proudly. He quickly realized that this ice-cold face was no longer his little junior sister, so he turned away from her contempt.

“It’s just so-so…”

A voice as low as a mosquito’s buzz sounded in his ears.

Xu Xiaoshou’s sense of hearing was so acute yet he almost did not catch what she said. He immediately glanced over. “What did you say?!”

The wind ruffled her silver hair so that it covered her side profile. Lei Xi’er stared intently at the distant battlefield. A great battle was about to break out. “Strange…” Xu Xiaoshou muttered softly. He wanted to shake off Lei Xi’er’s hand, but he couldn’t.

The vitality spiritual energy was being transmitted constantly through the warmth of her palms. It turned into the Breathing Technique Transformation and healed his injuries.

Xu Xiaoshou opened his mouth and was about to speak.

A loud explosion occurred in the distance and interrupted what he wanted to say – ‘I have my own Spirit Mark of Life in my Yuan Mansion’.

“Long…”

When he looked up, he saw that the two people whose negotiation had failed, had launched their attacks without any hesitation.

Bazhun’an only used three-quarters of the power of the Four Divine Pillars, and Dao Qiongcang chose to self-destruct without any further ado!

Yes, self-destruction!

The explosion didn’t spread out, didn’t cause any strange changes, and didn’t hurt anyone.

Under the cover of a layer of the Divine Secret, all traces left behind by Dao Qiongcang on Abyss Island were erased.

The green chains raised by Bazhun’an naturally lost their target.

Ha, he ran so fast.

As he gazed at the black hole in front of him and sensed Dao Qiongcang’s gradually disappearing aura, Bazhun’an shook his head with a smile and did not pursue the matter.

It was impossible for him to take down Dao Qiongcang. He had expected this.

This guy had prepared countless trump cards for himself. He would not be like Wangze Holy Emperor who was caught after he met the attack head-on and damaged his own body.

He was very shrewd!

It could be said that he had never really entered this round and had protected himself well.

However…

If he didn’t enter this trap and was caught in the middle, where could he escape

Bazhun’an reached into his pocket and took out a telepathic communication stone. He looked at the huge black hole in front of him and then looked at the people who trembled in fear on Abyss Island.

It was time to end it.

After he injected his spiritual source, Bazhun’an’s body trembled violently, but he concealed this huge tremor very well and also kept the stone in his palm hidden.

The Taoist music was decadent and reverberated in all directions. This was also a piece of advice that Dao Qiongcang would not heed!

“Day to day dreams often come true.”

“If you want to be unfettered like me, you have enter the path of madness..”
